unnormalised: Really enjoy these athlete biographies! Just finished reading about Milkha Singh - what an inspiration! Remember watching "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag" in Delhi years ago. Amazing how much he achieved, representing India in the Olympics. Any plans to cover P.T. Usha or maybe someone from the National Sports Institute, Patiala? Would love to read more about the struggles and triumphs of our Indian athletes.
